title: "HSBC unveil AI-powered equity index structured product"
excerpt: "HSBC has added an AI-powered equity index structured product to its wealth offerings in Hong Kong. The new index is part of the AiPEX family of indices, which was developed by HSBC with EquBot, using IBM Watson AI to analyse millions of data points and turn them into investment insights."
